prompts: Show me a sturdy dragon Pokemon with a shell-like body and metallic features.
Create a Pokemon that resembles a rock with a tough exterior and hidden power.
Generate a dragon-type Pokemon that embodies resilience and strength in its design.
Design a Pokemon with a round, armored appearance, perfect for defensive strategies.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a basic form into a powerful dragon creature.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous terrains and has rock-like attributes.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, shiny surface and a tough, protective shell.
